Detailed Description

template<class allocator_type__ = typename NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE<u8>, class category_cell_allocator_type__ = typename NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE< typename containers::handle_map_cell_type<typename tagged_heap_category_t<allocator_type__>> >, class category_id_allocator_type__ = typename NCPP_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR_TEMPLATE< typename containers::handle_map_id_type<typename tagged_heap_category_t<allocator_type__>> >>
